trans-unit.resname: APC·86 | Strength of Night | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Kicker o B (You may pay an additional o B as you play this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you paid the kicker cost, Zombies you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 增幅黑（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付黑）由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。若你已支付其增幅费用，则由你操控的灵俑再额外得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Messenger
trans-unit.target: 森林信驿

trans-unit.source: Trample When Sylvan Messenger comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 践踏当森林信驿进场时，展示你牌库顶上的四张牌。将所有以此法展示的地精牌置于你的手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Symbiotic Deployment
trans-unit.target: 共生部署

trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step. o1, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抓牌步骤。1，横置由你操控的两个未横置生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."\n—Eladamri
trans-unit.target: 「你们明白自己的任务。我明白你们的意志。现在天罗城塞将会明白何谓挫败。」～艾拉达力

trans-unit.source: Tranquil Path
trans-unit.target: 安宁路径

trans-unit.source: Destroy all enchantments. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结界。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.
trans-unit.target: 妃雅丽兹在扭曲的非瑞克西亚地狱中清理出一条道路，替旅法师们省下了大量的时间。

trans-unit.source: Urborg Elf
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格地精

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add o G, o U, or o B to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 横置：加绿，蓝或黑到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格的地精正如沼泽般致命而善变。

trans-unit.source: Aether Mutation
trans-unit.target: 乙太突变

trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

trans-unit.source: Captain's Maneuver

trans-unit.source: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.

trans-unit.source: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the *Weatherlight* could be used as a defensive weapon.
trans-unit.target: 西赛发现晴空号的镜面船身可以当成防御性的武器。

trans-unit.source: Consume Strength

trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。另一个目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.
trans-unit.target: 当穆塔尼的部队长驱直入乌尔博格时，沼地的衰败转而成为了生者的盛宴。

trans-unit.source: Cromat

trans-unit.source: o Wo B: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat. o Uo R: Cromat gains flying until end of turn. o Bo G: Regenerate Cromat. o Ro W: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn. o Go U: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 白黑：消灭阻挡克罗玛特，或是被克罗玛特所阻挡的目标生物。蓝红：克罗玛特获得飞行异能直到回合结束。黑绿：重生克罗玛特。红白：克罗玛特得+1/+1直到回合结束。绿蓝：将克罗玛特置于其拥有者的牌库顶上。

trans-unit.source: Death Grasp

trans-unit.source: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.
trans-unit.target: 约格莫夫的极上喜悦，来自于观赏英雄打败另一位英雄。

trans-unit.source: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.
trans-unit.target: 他的根部乐于汲取来自清流的水，以及来自非瑞克西亚战士的机油血液。

trans-unit.source: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

trans-unit.source: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

trans-unit.target: 大地隆起，型塑了数以千计的小战士。这场战争还有得打。

trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库里所有的牌。由一个对手从其中选出一张生物牌，一张地牌，以及一张非生物且非地的牌。将该些牌置于你的手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause—Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.
trans-unit.target: 一束巨大的法术流，使得多明纳里亚的运行为之一顿～穆塔尼已将亚维马雅移置到乌尔博格的边境。

trans-unit.source: Last Stand
trans-unit.target: 奋抗到底

trans-unit.source: Target opponent loses 2 life for each swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each forest you control. You gain 2 life for each plains you control. Draw a card for each island you control, then discard that many cards from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一张沼泽，目标对手便失去2点生命。奋抗到底对目标生物造成等同于由你操控的山脉数量之伤害。你每操控一张树林，便将一个1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。你每操控一张平原，便获得2点生命。你抓取若干牌，其数量等同于由你操控的海岛数量，然后从你的手上弃掉等量的牌。

trans-unit.source: Lightning Angel

trans-unit.source:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
—Memorial inscription

trans-unit.source: As Brass Herald comes into play, choose a creature type. When Brass Herald comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 于黄铜传令使进场时，选择一种生物类别。当黄铜传令使进场时，展示你牌库顶上的四张牌。将所有以此法展示，且为该类别的生物牌置于你的手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。该类别的生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Dodecapod
trans-unit.target: 打肢怪

trans-unit.source: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod from your hand, put it into play with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 若由对手所操控的咒语或异能使得你从手上弃掉打肢怪时，则改为将打肢怪放置进场且上面有两个+1/+1指示物，而非置于你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Dragon Arch
trans-unit.target: 召龙拱门

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: Put a multicolored creature card from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: 2，横置：将一张多色的生物牌从你的手上放置进场。

trans-unit.source: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.
trans-unit.target: 法师们渴求著拱门的力量，却忘记了它只让龙更容易召唤，却未必更容易控制。

trans-unit.source: Emblazoned Golem
trans-unit.target: 纹章魔像

trans-unit.source: Kicker o X (You may pay an additional o X as you play this spell.) Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way. If you paid the kicker cost, Emblazoned Golem comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 增幅X（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付X）只能以有色法术力支付X，并且每种颜色最多只能以此法支付一点法术力。若你已支付其增幅费用，则纹章魔像进场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Legacy Weapon
trans-unit.target: 远古神兵

trans-unit.source: o Wo Uo Bo Ro G: Remove target permanent from the game. If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
trans-unit.target: 白蓝黑红绿：将目标永久物移出对战。若远古神兵将自任何地方置入坟墓场，则改为展示远古神兵，并将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: APC·138 | Mask of Intolerance | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 偏执的面具

trans-unit.resname: APC·138 | Mask of Intolerance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，若在该牌手所操控的地之中，有四种或更多种基本地类别，偏执的面具便对该牌手造成3点伤害。
